message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds a significant value to me and I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. Considering its unique qualities and the impact it could have on your endeavors, I am extending a special offer to you. If you decide to proceed with this purchase, I am proposing a price of $1,200,000. This amount reflects the true worth of the product while also allowing us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product. I look forward to the possibility of working together.
